description: A flavorful and aromatic chicken curry that's perfect for any occasion.
steps: Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds.
Once they splutter, add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add garlic, ginger, and green chilies, cooking for another minute.
Stir in the pureed tomatoes and cook until the mixture thickens.
Add curry powder, turmeric powder, and salt; mix well.
Add chicken pieces and cook until they are browned.
Stir in the yogurt and cook for 15-20 minutes until the chicken is fully cooked.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot.

description: Juicy and tender grilled chicken breast, perfect for a healthy meal.
steps: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
In a bowl, mix olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Coat the chicken breasts with the marinade and let them sit for 15 minutes.
Grill the chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked.
Remove from the grill and drizzle with fresh lemon juice before serving.

description: A flavorful curry made with tender Rohu fish, perfect for pairing with rice.
steps: Heat mustard oil in a pan and add cumin seeds.
Once they splutter, add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and green chilies, cooking for another minute.
Stir in the pureed tomatoes, turmeric powder, and salt; cook until the mixture thickens.
Add the fish pieces gently and cook for 15 minutes, ensuring they don’t break.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot.

description: Crispy and flavorful fried Catla fish, perfect for a quick meal.
steps: Marinate the fish with lemon juice, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
Fry the fish fillets for 4-5 minutes on each side until golden brown.
Remove and place on paper towels to drain excess oil.
Serve hot with rice or salad.

description: Fluffy and creamy scrambled eggs, a quick and nutritious breakfast.
steps: In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
Melt butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and gently stir with a spatula.
Cook until just set but still creamy, about 3-4 minutes.
Garnish with chopped chives and serve immediately.

description: Crispy and juicy chicken nuggets, perfect for kids and adults alike.
ingredients: 500g chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces
steps: Season the chicken pieces with garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Dredge each piece in flour, then dip in beaten eggs, and finally coat with breadcrumbs.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
Fry the nuggets for 4-5 minutes until golden brown on all sides.
Remove and drain on paper towels before serving with your favorite dipping sauce.

description: Crunchy and delicious fish fingers, perfect for a snack or meal.
ingredients: 500g white fish fillets, cut into strips
steps: Season the fish strips with paprika, salt, and pepper.
Dredge each strip in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
Fry the fish fingers for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden brown.
Remove and drain on paper towels before serving with tartar sauce.
